human: Describe what is happening in this image

gpt:
In the image, there are three young men standing together in what appears to be an indoor setting with a wooden wall or paneling in the background and ceiling lights overhead. All three men are wearing casual light-colored t-shirts. 

The man on the left is wearing glasses, has short dark hair, and is donning a crossbody bag. He is making a thumbs-up gesture with his right hand.

The man in the middle has short black hair, and he's posing with a peace sign using his right hand. He seems to have a friendly expression on his face.

The man on the right is also wearing glasses and has short black hair. He has a slight smile on his face and his right hand is resting on the middle man's shoulder.

All of them seem to be in a good mood, possibly enjoying a casual gathering or outing. The ambiance gives a hint of a well-lit public space, possibly a café or a lobby area.
